website_summaries.verdict: This hand cream lives up to its name, and earns rave reviews for how awesome it smells and how nice it feels on your hands – but the downside is that you don't get much for the high price.
pros: Stands out for its luscious almond scent and rich, creamy consistency that moisturizes, absorbs quickly, and protects both hands and nails
cons: Comes at a high price, considering you only get 1 oz
